body:
We expose "disableInitialHostLookup " in the server config for cassandra configuration: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/common/config/config.go#L271

Would be great to expose a similar flag for the temporal-cassandra-tool as well

comments.body: I'm working on getting approval from my employer's legal team for the CLA, but I've got a patch to add this config and to add another to also disable the host event based auto discovery as well. That is seemingly another path to get these bad connections.

title: Expose disableInitialHostLookup for temporal-cassandra-tool
